SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_NO, (SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN J WHERE J.CHAT_ROOM_NO = R.CHAT_ROOM_NO AND MEMBER_NO != #{memberNo}) CHAT_FR_NO, (SELECT MEMBER_NM FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = (SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN J WHERE J.CHAT_ROOM_NO = R.CHAT_ROOM_NO AND MEMBER_NO != #{memberNo}) ) CHAT_FR_NM
FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN R JOIN MEMBER B USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND R.STATUS_CD = 1 ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT MESSAGE , CM_NO,CHAT_ROOM_NO,MEMBER_IMG_PATH,MEMBER_IMG_NM, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1 THEN TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END "CREATE_DT", MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_NM FROM CHAT_MESSAGE JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER_IMG USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = ${chatNo} ORDER BY CM_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo} AND STATUS_CD = 1 AND MEMBER_NO = #{targetNo}

SELECT TO_USER, MEMBER.MEMBER_NICKNM, MEMBER.MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_IMG_PATH, MEMBER_IMG_NM, FOLLOW.MEMBER_NO FROM FOLLOW JOIN MEMBER ON (FOLLOW.TO_USER = MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER_IMG ON (FOLLOW.TO_USER = MEMBER_IMG.MEMBER_NO) WHERE FOLLOW.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} INTERSECT SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{friendNo})
SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM (SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} INTERSECT SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{friendNo})
